title: 3 SOL data points suggest $130 was the bottom: Is it time for a return to range highs?
description: Charts and onchain data suggest that SOL might have bottomed at $130. Should traders anticipate a rally back to $200?

title: New Toku–PDAX partnership lets Filipino workers receive pay in stablecoins
description: The integration links token-based payroll with regulated cash-out rails, giving Filipino workers a way to receive stablecoin wages and convert them instantly to pesos.

title: Marshall Islands launches universal basic income program using digital wallet
description: The launch of the UBI program, utilizing a “digital sovereign bond,” occurred two months after the IMF warned against the island nation using an “untested” digital asset.

title: Paxos debuts USDG0 to extend its regulated stablecoin across multiple blockchains
description: The new omnichain token brings fully backed dollar liquidity to Hyperliquid, Plume and Aptos while keeping a single regulated supply across networks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin charts flag $75K bottom, but analysts predict 40% rally before 2025 ends
description: Bitcoin whales are accelerating their purchasing despite BTC’s short-term bearish outlook. Meanwhile, Wall Street analysts expect BTC to hit new all-time highs before the end of 2025.

title: Regulator clarifies US banks can handle gas fees using crypto holdings
description: The OCC said authorized national banks could hold crypto under specific circumstances, citing examples under the recently passed GENIUS act.

title: Bitcoin finally bounces, outpacing stocks ahead of Nvidia earnings: Will the BTC rally hold?

title: ETH falls into ‘buy zone,’ but volatility-averse traders take a wait-and-see approach

title: Stablecoin giant Tether backs Ledn, targets global crypto lending

title: Bitcoin Miner Canaan Soars 16% After Shock 104% Revenue Spike, Defying Bitcoin’s Crash
description: Canaan has delivered a sharp turnaround as a Bitcoin Miner, with Q3 revenue up 104%, record self-mining output, higher mining revenue and expanding BTC and ETH reserves, while peers such as HIVE Digital and TeraWulf have also reported stronger results in a softer crypto market. title: Analysts Warn Saylor’s BTC Strategy is “Hurting Bitcoin Price Action” as His Portfolio Turns Red
description: Analyst scrutiny of Michael Saylor’s leveraged Bitcoin strategy has grown as DAT structures, ETF and treasury holdings, and quiet buying on “red days” have raised concern over MicroStrategy’s risk profile, pressure on BTC price action and tension with Bitcoin’s cypherpunk, sovereign-money vision. title: Brazil Plans Crypto Tax Crackdown on Cross-Border Payments to Close Loophole: Report
description: Brazil has considered extending its IOF tax to crypto foreign-exchange operations after stablecoins have been reclassified as FX instruments, as authorities have sought to close a regulatory gap in a fast-growing market while public finances have faced renewed strain. title: Tether Dives Into Bitcoin-Backed Lending as Market Soars Past $1B in Loans
description: Tether has invested in Ledn as bitcoin-backed lending has accelerated, with $2.8B in loans and over $1B issued in 2025, while revenue above $100M and tighter risk controls point to a cautious crypto credit market as regulators add stricter lending rules. title: Grab Signs Web3 Deal with StraitsX to Bring Stablecoin Payments Into Its Super-App

title: [LIVE] Altcoin Price Watch: Aster and Zcash Rally Amid Bitcoin Breakdown Below $90,000 – Is This Just the Beginning?

title: Deutsche Börse Brings MiCA-Ready Stablecoins On-chain With SG-FORGE

title: Revolut Taps Polygon for Crypto Remittances, Processing $690M Since Integration

title: Amplify Launches XRP-Based Option Income ETF
